Apparently the Gundams are given names based off of things like names from Watership down.

RX-121 Gundam TR-1 (Hazel)

RX-121-2 Gundam TR-1 (Hazel II)

RX-121-3C Gundam TR-1 (Hyzenthlay)

RX-124 Gundam TR-6 (Woundwort)

RX-124 Gundam TR-6 (Dandelion II)

RX-124 Gundam TR-6 (Fiver II)
